subject: Boxing
Television
lead_paragraph: Boxing may fade from the sports consciousness for long stretches, but thanks to heavy marketing, it will be tough to ignore the May 5 fight between Oscar De La Hoya and Floyd Mayweather Jr.
snippet: Boxing may fade from the sports consciousness for long stretches, but thanks to heavy marketing, it will be tough to ignore the May 5 fight between Oscar De La Hoya and Floyd Mayweather Jr.
